text:
What a fellowship what a joy divine
Leaning on the everlasting arms.
What a blessedness,
what a peace is mine
Leaning on the everlasting arms.

Leaning, leaning,
Safe and secure from all alarms;
Leaning, leaning,
Leaning on the everlasting arms.

Leaning on the everlasting arms;
Oh, how bright the path grows
from day to day

Leaning on the everlasting arms.

what have | to fear
